00038 /*! This class provides a wrapper to writing a single copy number file of the Command Console format. */
00039 class CopyNumberResultWriter
00040 {
00041 private:
00042 
00043     /*! The maximum probe set name. */
00044     std::map<affymetrix_calvin_io::MultiDataType, int> maxProbeSetNameLength;

00047     int numberProbeSets;

00107     /*! Set the max probe set name length.
00108      * @param len The maximum length.
00109      */
00110     void MaximumProbeSetNameLength(int len) { maxProbeSetNameLength[affymetrix_calvin_io::CopyNumberMultiDataType] = len; }
00111 
00112     /*! Set the max cyto region name length.
00113      * @param len The maximum length.
00114      */
00115     void MaximumCytoRegionNameLength(int len) { maxProbeSetNameLength[affymetrix_calvin_io::CytoMultiDataType] = len; }

00118      * @param len The maximum length.
00119      */
00120     void MaximumGenotypeProbeSetNameLength(int len) { maxProbeSetNameLength[affymetrix_calvin_io::GenotypeMultiDataType] = len; }

00168     /*! Summary parameters. This includes items such as IQR, etc. */

00171     /*!  Store the starting probe set index and count of probe sets for the given chromosome.
00172      * @param chr The chromosome value
00173      * @param startIndex The index of the probe sets that the given chromosome starts at.
00174      * @param count The number of probe sets for the given chromosome.
00175      */
00176     void SetChromosomeProbeSetIndexInformation(u_int8_t chr, int startIndex, int count);
00177 
00178     /*! Create the results file with the header information (no data is written). This function
00179      * will throw a std::string exception on errors.
00180      * @param cel The CEL file data object.
00181      * @param fileName The name of the results file to create.
00182      * @return True if successful.
00183      */
00184     void CreateResultFile(affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData& cel, const std::string& fileName);
00185 
00186     /*! Write the probe set result to the file.
00187      * @param entry The results.
00188      */
00189     void WriteProbeSetResult(const affymetrix_calvin_data::ProbeSetMultiDataCopyNumberData& entry);
00190 
00191     /*! Write the cyto region result to the file.
00192      * @param entry The results.
00193      */
00194     void WriteCytoRegionResult(const affymetrix_calvin_data::ProbeSetMultiDataCytoRegionData& entry);
00195 
00196     /*! Write the genotype probe set result to the file.
00197      * @param entry The results.
00198      */
00199     void WriteGenotypeProbeSetResult(const affymetrix_calvin_data::ProbeSetMultiDataGenotypeData& entry);

00201     /*! Close the output file. */
00202     void CloseResultsFile();
